title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid details and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user details including email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that the registration completes successfully with a success message.
Verify user is redirected to the login page or logged in automatically.

title: User Registration with Existing Email
description: Verify that registering with an already registered email shows an appropriate error.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter an email address that is already registered and fill other details.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm error message stating the email is already in use.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can login with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email/username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.
Verify that session management maintains login status across page refresh.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid email/username or incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify error message is shown indicating invalid credentials.

title: Food Entry with Manual Input
description: Verify user can successfully log a food entry by manually entering item details which invoke AI nutritional analysis.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the food entry form on the dashboard.
Manually enter food name, quantity, and other relevant details.
Submit the food entry form.
Verify AI analysis runs and nutritional breakdown is displayed.
Verify the entry is saved and appears in recent food entries.

title: Food Entry with Barcode Scanning
description: Verify the barcode scanning feature adds a food entry with correct nutritional data.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the food entry form.
Use barcode scanner to scan a product barcode.
Verify correct food item is identified and nutritional information is populated automatically.
Submit the form.
Verify entry is saved and listed in recent entries.

title: AI Coach Provides Personalized Nutrition Recommendations
description: Verify the AI Coach assistant returns contextually appropriate personalized nutrition advice based on user data and conversation.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the AI Coach chat interface.
Enter a health or nutrition related query.
Verify AI provides precise, relevant, and personalized recommendations.
Follow up with additional questions to test contextual understanding.
Verify chat maintains context and responds appropriately.

title: Nutrition Tracking Charts Accuracy and Update
description: Verify nutrition tracking charts show accurate and updated data reflecting user food inputs and progress over time.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the nutrition tracker page.
Verify charts display current nutrition summary (calories, macros, micronutrients).
Add multiple food entries with various nutritional values.
Verify all related charts update immediately with correct aggregated data.
Verify charts handle edge cases such as zero values or very large quantities gracefully.

title: User Profile Updates Save Correctly and Persist
description: Verify that edits to user profile and settings save correctly and persist after logout/login cycles.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the profile management page.
Update personal information fields and application preferences.
Save changes.
Verify success confirmation is shown.
Logout and login again.
Verify previously saved details are loaded correctly.

title: Theme Toggle Functionality and UI Consistency
description: Verify the theme toggle correctly switches between light and dark mode without UI glitches or loss of user preferences.

steps.description: Login and navigate to any page.
Toggle the theme switch to dark mode.
Verify UI colors and components adapt appropriately to dark theme.
Toggle back to light mode.
Verify UI returns to light theme correctly without styling issues.
Reload or navigate to different pages.
Verify theme preference is persisted across sessions and pages.

title: Landing Page Content and Responsiveness
description: Verify the landing page loads fully with all content visible and is visually appealing and responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page on desktop viewport.
Verify all sections including features, testimonials, and call-to-action load correctly.
Resize viewport to tablet size.
Verify layout adapts properly without overlap or missing content.
Resize viewport to mobile size.
Verify landing page remains usable and visually consistent on mobile.

title: Backend API Security and Data Handling
description: Verify backend API endpoints securely handle user data with authentication and proper data validation.

steps.description: Attempt API access without authentication.
Verify unauthorized requests are rejected with 401/403 errors.
Login and obtain valid session/token.
Perform CRUD operations on user data (profile, food entries, nutrition goals).
Verify correct data is returned or stored.
Send malformed or invalid data to endpoints.
Verify backend returns appropriate error codes and messages without corrupting data.

title: UI Components Rendering and Styling Consistency
description: Verify reusable UI components render correctly with expected DaisyUI styling and behave consistently across the application.

steps.description: Navigate to pages using shared UI components (buttons, input forms, modals, navbars).
Verify components render as per design specification and contain correct DaisyUI styles.
Verify components respond correctly to user interactions (hover, click, focus).
Toggle themes and verify UI components adapt styling accordingly.

title: Application Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Verify the entire application UI is responsive and functions correctly on defined viewport sizes: desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Load the application on a desktop browser.
Verify all pages display correctly without layout issues.
Resize or emulate tablet viewport.
Verify navigation, forms, and content adapt to tablet layout.
Resize or emulate mobile viewport.
Verify menu and UI components adapt for mobile usability and accessibility.

title: Session Timeout and Logout Functionality
description: Verify that the user session expires appropriately after inactivity and manual logout functions correctly.

steps.description: Login and remain inactive for session timeout duration.
Verify user is automatically logged out after timeout and redirected to login page.
Login again and manually click logout button.
Verify session terminates and user is redirected to login.

title: Handling Large Volume of Food Entries without Performance Degradation
description: Verify that the system handles large numbers of food entries gracefully and UI performance remains acceptable.

steps.description: Login and add a large volume (e.g., 1000+) of food entries via API or UI.
Verify the dashboard, recent entries, and charts load in reasonable time without errors.
Filter or search food entries.
Verify system returns accurate filtered results efficiently.

title: AI Coach Response to Invalid or Unsupported Queries
description: Verify AI Coach gracefully handles unrecognized or irrelevant queries without crashing or providing misleading information.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Coach chat interface.
Enter nonsensical, ambiguous, or irrelevant queries/questions.
Verify AI Coach responds politely indicating lack of understanding or redirects to help resources.
